messages.subject: Great site!

messages.messageBody:
Just had to share about a GREAT site I found!

I have been on this site for almost 6 months.? I have gotten many homeschooling books,? (even Abeka and Sonlight), great literature?for the whole family?and one college textbook (saved over $50 with this one book).? I have never been disappointed in any of the books received.? I highly recommend the site!

Here is how it works:
Once you post 9 books into the system, you get to request 3 books immediately- FREE! It is that simple! You will also then be able to go to the site and create a referral email to send to your friends and family. When they join, you will get 1 credit?for each?as well!
It is a win - win situation!

The membership is totally free.

You really need to check this out!

http://www.paperbackswap.com/index.php?r_by=Classicaledmom%40aol.com

Best Regards,
Julie
________________________________________________________________________
Email and AIM finally together. You've gotta check out free AOL Mail! - http://mail.aol.com
